review:
Met the Dr after getting a referred by one of my friend for my kid, Dr explained clearly and treated my kid . she is fine now and Dr is good in explaining , trust worty and I got the right Dr for my kid , he is also scheduled for vaccination for further care. 

Completely happy about the treatment and his way of explaining.
